subject: Think Your Trailer Is Safe? The Stats Say Otherwise
preview: Winter brings risks, see how to secure your trailer.
hero_title: Most Trailer Thefts Happen in 'Safe' Spots
hero_subtitle: Think your trailer is safe this winter? Here is the truth.
descriptive_block_subtitle: Real stats reveal what actually protects your trailer.
descriptive_block_content:
75%


Thefts occur in "trusted" spots

65%


Locks fail to prevent theft

0%


Drop in theft during winter

Most thefts happen where owners feel safe. Trust your protection, not your parking spot.

Simple locks aren't enough. Advanced solutions are the key to securing your trailer.

Winter offers no safety. Thieves target unattended equipment year-round.
product_block_subtitle: Upgrade to products that close real security gaps. AMPLOCK protects your trailer during winter and throughout the year.
full_text_formatted:
SUBJECT: Think Your Trailer Is Safe? The Stats Say Otherwise
PREVIEW: Winter brings risks—see how to secure your trailer.
HERO IMAGE: Most Trailer Thefts Happen in 'Safe' Spots (Placeholder)
HERO TITLE: Most Trailer Thefts Happen in 'Safe' Spots
HERO SUBTITLE: Think your trailer is safe this winter? Here is the truth.
CTA: See Security Facts

--- DESCRIPTIVE BLOCK ---
TITLE: Common Myths That Cost Owners
CONTENT: • 75% of trailer thefts occur when owners trust their parking spot. 
• 65% of stolen trailers used simple locks that failed. 
• Winter does not lower theft rates. Unattended equipment is still targeted. 
• Visual deterrents and parking location cannot stop determined thieves. 
Protect your trailer with advanced locks that work even in winter's toughest conditions. AMPLOCK delivers true security.
CTA DESCRIPTIVE: View Relevant Tools

--- PRODUCTS ---
- Ball Coupler Locks
- Kingpin Locks
- Trailer Door & Container Locks
CTA: See Collection

--- FOOTER ---
N/A
